channel.title: Batteries on Miles Hilliard
channel.description: Recent content in Batteries on Miles Hilliard

item.title: Robotics & Engineering - Week of 09/15/25
item.description: This week started off a little bit differently. Rather than diving straight into the perpetual golf cart project, I was in need of a brass bushing for a 911 Distributor rebuild. Existing ones cost over $150, so with a little help from Tim, I was able to make my own free of cost. By cutting down some brass stock and turning it on the lathe, we created the bushing with tolerances of around 1/1000th of an inch.
